description:
Brock has that wholesome blonde boy-next-door thing about him. His face is pure innocence. He's got some pretty tough looking tattoos, and I have to wonder if he created them to help balance that look.
Brock is a hard worker. He's a genuine plumber, and if he bent over to work on my pipes and his cracked showed, I don't think I will be making a fuss or joking at it. He can bend over and flash some crack any time he wants!
He's also always wanted to do porn (straight stuff of course), and this was his first opportunity to show his stuff off. He was a little nervous, but got into it as we went along. He definitely likes to show off.
He was out drinking the night before, so was a little hung over, but he did great.
So enjoy this sweet kid with a devilish streak!
title: Brock - Solo
